query: (Background: "anaplastic large cell lymphoma"^4 OR "non-Hodgkin lymphoma" OR ALCL OR Doc_title: "anaplastic large cell lymphoma"^4 OR "non-Hodgkin lymphoma" OR ALCL) AND (Background: ALK^4 OR "CD246" OR "NBLST3" OR Doc_title: ALK^4 OR "CD246" OR "NBLST3") AND (Background: "treatment" OR "therapy" OR "radiation therapy" OR "surgical excision" OR "Vorinostat" OR "Romidepsin" OR "Bexarotene" OR "CHOP" OR "chemotherapy")
